name: RetroGradeRunner
description:
Control blocks and player at the same time to traverse the Level and collect the lost cartridges.

CONTROLS:

Play solo or optional local Co-Op

Player: WASD

Blocks: Arrow Keys

Pause: P

Reset to Checkpoint: R

GOALS:

Collect all the cartridges and get to the end.

Created For the University of Nevada Reno 24 Hours ACM Hackathon

Created By;

Nathan Evans

Chris Trimble

Allen Ma

Levi Scully
